channel.title: Meeting

item.title: Meeting
item.dc:creator: @M_A_R_T_Y M A R T Y
item.description:
@M_A_R_T_Y wrote:

Trying to add a command that teles all moderators to one place, and teles me to a different place.

All it does with this code is tele me to the place im supposed to be at… but doesn’t teleport the moderators.

if (command.startsWith("modmeeting") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players if (p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Marty")) { p.toX = 3165; p.toY = 9629; } else if (p.playerRights == 1) { chairZone(); sM("An administrator started a moderator meeting!"); } } }

Read full topic
